summary: BILLY MAYS HERE! Tired of Dynamic Snow ruining your landscapes worry no more cause ive removed it all with the power of Oxiclean!
descriptionHtml:
I always disliked the dynamic snow that resembled elmers glue more then anything So i went ahead and removed it. This is part two of a summer\spring overhaul on working on but figured some folks might have a need for it. This will remove dynamic snow from lod objects aswell so keep that in mind for compatibility reasons other then that you shouldnt have a problems compatibility wise.

[b][u]Tools used:[/u][/b]

[i]TES5Edit:[/i] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?
[i]TES5LODGen:[/i] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?

[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]

[i][b]Acid Zebra[/b][/i] - For his work on Seasons of Skyrim - Springtime Overhaul was a great reference.Â  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27636/?

[b][u]My Other Mods: [/u][/b]If you want the Non-Snowy Pines used in pictures check out mt mod below
[b][u]
[/u][/b] SummerSets - Trees http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71743/?

author: DJValor
